tweets.text:
Large waves along the coast in parts of north-west, south and south-west England on Saturday and Sunday could lead to minor flooding. Minor surface water and river impacts are also expected in south-east England on Sunday. 

Sign up for flood warnings: https://t.co/60gMJ48T7b

4 days until @AnglianWater, @WaterREast, @EnvAgency, @WTW_UK, @aguas_andinas, @EUClimateAction and more explore how we can transform #infrastructure investments to deliver a #resilient and #NetZero world. Register to join this #RaceToZero Dialogue here: https://t.co/vMgaH4LGRA https://t.co/Q4hfwJ4nQY

Being prepared for winter is a huge team effort across @EnvAgency & with all our partners. A big thank you to everyone involved. Over 5 million properties are at flood risk, check here where you live & see how you can prepare https://t.co/gEvRx6ALiK #floodaware https://t.co/L0SkqpULHI

tweets.text: @RussellB1ggs @RDW1 @KarenShackleto5 @theriverstrust @WildTroutTrust @EnvAgencyAnglia @jamesowild @N_Rivers_Trust @The_WMA @Feargal_Sharkey Hi, can you please private message the best contact telephone number & advise if you've seen a discharge point along the river upstream? Can you please advise the location along the river where you saw this too. Thanks

River word of the day: riffle! This is an area where shallow water flows rapidly over gravel, agitating the flow. As a result the water here is highly oxgenated, which is favoured by spawning trout and bullheads. Lots of riffles in the new channel in #StokeOnTrent!
@EnvAgencyMids https://t.co/ewsqvsq1Sz

@luxmy_g @BBCBreakfast @EnvAgency @luxmy_g Thank you for keeping this in the news and for your excellent reporting skills. Pushing @OliverHarmarEA to answer the questions that are on the lips of so many residents in our beautiful village of Fishlake! Let‚Äôs hope we never go through the events of last year againü§û

Another week, another devastating pollution incident on the Bristol Frome. 

BART's work on the ground in the coming years will aim to address issues like these in the Bristol Frome catchment.

entity.name: The Simpsons
entity.description: This long-running animated comedy focuses on the eponymous family in the town of Springfield in an unnamed U.S. state. The head of the Simpson family, Homer, is not a typical family man. A nuclear-plant employee, he does his best to lead his family but often finds that they are leading him. The family includes loving, blue-haired matriarch Marge, troublemaking son Bart, overachieving daughter Lisa and baby Maggie. Other Springfield residents include the family's religious neighbour, Ned Flanders, family physician Dr Hibbert, Moe the bartender and police chief Clancy Wiggum.
